data.message: Hi facebook, when will you start taking action against all this "R.I.P Michael Schumacher" pages which are popping up, just to catch likes? He is not dead and those admins just want to push their sites. How would you feel about "R.I.P Marc Zuckerberg"? Would that be allowed? Please stop that madness soonest.

replies.message: Hi Pete. If you come across an account that violates the Facebook Terms, please report it. To report a Page, go to the Timeline and click the drop-down. Then select Report/Block and follow the on-screen directions to file a report. Thank you. -Ryan
